## BigNumber.isNaN() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is `NaN`<!-- -->, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(NaN)
x.isNaN()                       // true
y = new BigNumber('Infinity')
y.isNaN()                       // false
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isNaN(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
